name: library-management-system
description: Full-stack Library Management System with Playwright testing

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && PORT=5001 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npx playwright install
scripts.open: open http://localhost:3000 || xdg-open http://localhost:3000 || start http://localhost:3000

author: LMS Development Team
